name: Aqualogica Glow+ Smoothie Face Wash
description: An exfoliating natural face wash meant to provide immense hydration and care to your skin with the goodness of Papaya.

name: Dermatale Sunscreen - SPF 50 PA+++
description: Specially curated for sensitive skin, this tinted mattifying sunscreen with SPF 50, free of irritating ingredients like essential oils

name: Lakme Peach Milk Moisturizer
description: This sunscreen lotion is a blend of wholesome peaches and milk, which nourishes the skin deeply

name: The Derma Co Oil-Free Daily Face Moisturizer
description: Oil-Free Daily Face Moisturizer is a lightweight, non-greasy moisturizer that provides deep hydration for up to 24 hours

name: L'Oreal PARIS Hydra Genius Aloe Water
description: Used daily to care for dry and sensitive skin. Provides long-lasting hydration, traps water in the epidermis, protects against dry skin.

name: Ceramide & Vitamin C Sunscreen
description: Dr. Sheth’s Ceramide & Vitamin C Sunscreen, with SPF 50 PA+++, specially formulated for sensitive Indian skin

name: POND’S Sun Miracle SPF 50 PA++ Sunscreen Serum
description: POND'S Serum boost sunscreen prevent and fade dark patches with the power of SPF and NIACINAMIDE-C Serum.

name: CeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleanser
description: A gentle cleanser with ceramides and hyaluronic acid that removes dirt without stripping the skin’s natural moisture.

name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel
description: A refreshing, lightweight gel moisturizer that delivers intense hydration and locks in moisture for supple, smooth skin.
